name: Floating Crystal Flowers and Floating Crystal Platforms

imgDesc.text: A peculiar combination of mineral and plant. When affected by the energy of the Xenochromatic Ball Octopus, it will begin <color=#ffe14b>spinning for a period of time</color> . After Floating Crystal Flowers start spinning, Floating Crystal Platforms will appear.
The Floating Crystal Platforms will appear as the Floating Crystal Flowers rotate, then become invisible, and finally disappear as the flowers cease spinning.
